subject: Chemistry
question_text: NO 2 required for a reaction is produced by decomposition of N 2 O 5 in 4 2N 2 O 5 (   g ) →4NO 2 (   g ) + O 2 (   g ) The initial concentration of N 2 O 5 is 3   mol   L -1 2 . 75   mol   L -1 30 minutes. The rate of formation of NO 2 is x × 10 -3 mol   L -1 min-1 , value of x is ________.
